title: Center of mass velocity - 3-block system masses

content.description: Three blocks move across a horizontal surface with negligible friction. Blocks <math alttext="1" overflow="scroll"><mn>1</mn></math> and <math alttext="2" overflow="scroll"><mn>2</mn></math>, of mass <math alttext="m sub 1" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>m</mi><mn>1</mn></msub></math> and <math alttext="m sub 2" overflow="scroll"><msub><mi>m</mi><mn>2</mn></msub></math>, respectively, both move to right with speed <math alttext="v" overflow="scroll"><mi>v</mi></math>.
